title: Puppets
description: Puppets is a book that teaches readers about the four basic kinds of puppets and how they are operated. Readers are introduced to some famous puppets and to different kinds of puppet stages. The book also contains instructions for making several puppets.
highFrequencyWords: audience, cellophane, gesture, puppeteers, papier-maché, region's
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blends
awareness: Commas                : Identify and use commas in a series
phonics: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
